links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (2,0,-1)
formula: a(n)=Fibonacci(n)+Fibonacci(n+7)-1, n>=-2 - _Zerinvary Lajos_, Feb 01 2008O.g.f.: (-4*x^2 + 2*x + 3)/(x^3 - 2*x + 1) so with B=(-8 - 6*sqrt(5))/(5 + 3*sqrt(5)), C=(-8 + 6*sqrt(5))/(5 - 3*sqrt(5)), a(n) = -1 - B*(2/(-1-sqrt(5)))^n - C*(2/(-1+sqrt(5)))^n - Lambert Herrgesell (zero815(AT)googlemail.com), Feb 24 2008
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: More terms from _James A. Sellers_, Aug 08 2000
